name: My Best Friend Killed Herself
description:
Introduction

My best friend during my middle school days committed suicide.

When I received the news, I was so surprised that I couldn't react in any way. My hands shook so much that I could barely hold on to anything.

But in my mind, I had some kind of secret feeling of foreboding and fear. It was as if I "knew" why she had chosen to go down this path.

I was one of the murderers who killed my former best friend.

Gameplay

A short visual novel with slight horror elements. Players will play the role of a female high school student and decide whether they will choose to completely forget the death of their middle school friend or reconcile with her tragic end by choosing different options.

Platform

Production engine: Unity

Platform: PC (Windows/Mac)

Language: Simplified Chinese and English
